Trade/Device Name(s): UniCel DxH 900 Coulter Cellular Analysis System
UniCel DxH Slidemaker Stainer II Coulter Cellular Analysis System
UniCel DxH 690T Coulter Cellular Analysis System
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): UniCel DxH 900 Coulter Cellular Analysis System
UniCel DxH 690T Coulter Cellular Analysis System
UniCel DxH Slidemaker Stainer II Coulter Cellular Analysis System
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for UniCel DxH 900, DxH 690T, and DxH Slidemaker Stainer II Coulter Cellular Analysis Systems for automated hematology analysis of whole blood and body fluids in clinical labs
Indications for Use Summary: Quantitative, multi-parameter, automated hematology analysis of whole blood and body fluids for screening patient populations in clinical laboratories; includes slide preparation and staining for blood film examination
